plot: Ben, Gwen and Max attend a family wedding in which there is much more than meets the eye.

The Tennyson's attend the wedding of Uncle Max's other and grown nephew, Joel, with Ben as his reluctant ring bearer. The event has far greater significance than it seems. The marriage of Joel and Camille - a marriage of political significance by happenstance - will unify, or at least encourage a temporary truce between, two warring intergalactic factions; however, someone does not want that peace and works secretly to sabotage the proceedings. Ben's on it (if he's not shot as an alien party crasher first).—statmanjeff
